speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Brothers and sisters, it is my privilege to present the General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers of the Church for your sustaining vote.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Please express your support in the usual way wherever you may be. If there are those who oppose any of the proposals, we ask that you contact your stake president.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain Russell Marion Nelson as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints; Dallin Harris Oaks as First Counselor in the First Presidency; and Henry Bennion Eyring as Second Counselor in the First Presidency.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those opposed, if any, may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain Dallin H. Oaks as President of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles and M. Russell Ballard as Acting President of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor, please signify.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the following as members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles: M. Russell Ballard, Jeffrey R. Holland, Dieter F. Uchtdorf, David A. Bednar, Quentin L. Cook, D. Todd Christofferson, Neil L. Andersen, Ronald A. Rasband, Gary E. Stevenson, Dale G. Renlund, Gerrit W. Gong, and Ulisses Soares.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so indicate.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the counselors in the First Presidency and the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles as prophets, seers, and revelators.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Contrary, if there be any, by the same sign.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: The following General Authority Seventies will be released from their assignments and given emeritus status, effective on August 1, 2023: Elders Benjamín De Hoyos, Juan A. Uceda, and Kazuhiko Yamashita.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those who wish to express gratitude to these brethren and to their wives and families for their years of dedicated service throughout the world may do so by the uplifted hand.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: The following Area Seventies have been released from their assignments, effective immediately: J. Kimo Esplin and Alan T. Phillips.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those who wish to join us in expressing appreciation for their excellent service, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We note with appreciation the other Area Seventies who will complete their service this year and whose names can be found on the Church’s website.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those who wish to join in expressing gratitude to these brethren for their selfless service may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Effective immediately, we hereby release Brothers Ahmad S. Corbitt and Bradley Ray Wilcox from serving as First and Second Counselors in the Young Men General Presidency.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those who wish to show appreciation to these brethren for their service may so manifest.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We extend releases to the Young Women General Presidency, effective on August 1, 2023, as follows: Bonnie H. Cordon as President, Michelle D. Craig as First Counselor, and Rebecca L. Craven as Second Counselor.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All who wish to join us in expressing appreciation to these sisters for their devoted service, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the following as General Authority Seventies: Ahmad S. Corbitt, Robert M. Daines, J. Kimo Esplin, Christophe G. Giraud-Carrier, and Alan T. Phillips.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those opposed, by the same sign.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We note that 61 new Area Seventies were sustained during the general conference leadership meetings on Thursday, March 30, and then announced on the Church’s website.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We invite you to sustain these brethren in their new assignments.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed, by the same sign.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the following as the new Young Women General Presidency, to be effective on August 1, 2023: Emily Belle Freeman as President, Tamara Wood Runia as First Counselor, and Andrea Muñoz Spannaus as Second Counselor.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so signify.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the following as counselors in the Young Men General Presidency, effective immediately: Bradley Ray Wilcox as First Counselor and Michael T. Nelson as Second Counselor.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All in favor may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so manifest.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the other General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers as presently constituted.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All in favor may do so by the uplifted hand.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those opposed, if any.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Thank you, brothers and sisters, for your continued faith and prayers on behalf of the leadership of the Church.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Changes to Area Seventies

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: The following Area Seventies were sustained during a leadership session held as part of general conference:

role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: The following Area Seventies will be released on or before August 1, 2023:

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
